t: Lucy Activewear - Wikipedia
s: November 16, 2024 - Lucy Activewear (sometimes styled as "lucy" rather than "Lucy"), formerly known as Lucy.com, was an American clothing retailer based in Alameda, California. Founded in November 1999 by former Nike executives, it specialized in activewear for women including clothing intended for use during yoga.

t: Lucy Activewear Review Workout Clothing - Welcoming Simplicity
s: June 3, 2024 - All of their remaining stores closed in January 2018. At that time The North Face was carrying Lucy Activewear items on their website. As of 2020, it appeared the brand had totally been absorbed by The North Face, including names of some of the then popular Lucy clothing items.

t: Lucy Activewear will close stores and be folded into North Face brand | The Drum
s: February 27, 2017 - Lucy Activewear, a women’s sports and lifestyle apparel company started by former Nike executives in the late 1990s, announced that it will be closing a majority of its stores over the next few months and merging the brand with North Face.
